basicInfo.name: Velika
basicInfo.flavor: While on an adventure to punish those who follow the way of the Light, Velika came across a mage's stone that enhanced her black magic.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - All Allies
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 9s in Infinite Tower and Tower of Trials.
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 12s in Infinite Tower and Tower of Trials.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Skill Cooldown Reduction becomes 12s.

Skill 1.name: Summon Meteor
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 105% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 60% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Adds Damage: Deals additional damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.

Skill 2.name: Apparitions of Darkness
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 105% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 55% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Magic Vulnerability to 22%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 60% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Black Moon's Blessing
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 160% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Magic Damage Boost in Infinite Tower and Tower of Trials. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 33%.
 - Increases Effect: Magic Damage Boost to 31%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 185% of Magic Attack.
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 185% of Magic Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Experiments, research, truths, chocolate, salad, various magical equipment
profile.dislikes: The Seven Knights, the Celestial Realm, Ariel, foolishness
profile.story: While on an adventure to punish those who follow the way of the Light, Velika came across a mage's stone that enhanced her black magic.

basicInfo.name: Velika
basicInfo.flavor: Black Magicians are normally subservient to demons, the source of their power. However, Velika has managed to become an Arbiter of Darkness, and become equal in stature to high-ranking demons.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - All Allies
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 7s in Infinite Tower and Tower of Trials.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Summon Meteor
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 60% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Apparitions of Darkness
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Black Moon's Blessing
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 145% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Magic Damage Boost in Infinite Tower and Tower of Trials. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 21%.
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 145% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Velika
basicInfo.flavor: Velika, a student of Black magic, is a sassy mage and Ariel's archenemy.

 - All Allies
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 5s in Infinite Tower and Tower of Trials.

 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

All Enemies

 - Deals additional damage equal to 35% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 55% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 85% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack upon landing a Critical Hit.
 - 100% chance to inflict Magic Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

Self
